title: Prints Animals and Sounds
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(animalsounds) ## basic example code animal_sounds("dog", "woof") #> [1] "The dog goes woof!" animal_sounds("giraffe") #> [1] "The giraffe makes no sound."
